name: Magmar

evolution.description: Magmar can evolve into Magmortar at level 15 and above while holding a Magmarizer. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Spitfire Pokémon. Born in an active volcano. Its body is always cloaked in flames, so it looks like a big ball of fire.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: The flames from this Pokémon's body shine dim light in a 15 ft radius. In addition, when hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker is burned.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.
